instruction: Develop a narrative for the following abrupt dialogue.
input:
John: That's not how it happened!
Jane: You're wrong.
output: John and Jane had been arguing for hours, their differing opinions evident in every point they made. John had been adamant that he was right, but Jane had disagreed and so the argument had raged on. When John finally declared that it wasn't how it had happened, Jane quickly fired back that he was wrong. Baffled, John looked at her, trying to make sense of the situation.
